_comments: IFTTT filter code to do 'That' during a time range

body.scriptCode: var trigger_minutes = Meta.currentUserTime.minutes(); var trigger_hours = Meta.currentUserTime.hours(); var startTimeMinutes = 360; var stopTimeMinutes = 1024; var triggerTimeMinutes = trigger_minutes + trigger_hours * 60; if (startTimeMinutes == stopTimeMinutes) { skip('Gogogate.closeDoor'); } else { var doThat = Boolean(false); if ((startTimeMinutes < stopTimeMinutes) && (triggerTimeMinutes >= startTimeMinutes && triggerTimeMinutes <= stopTimeMinutes)) { doThat = Boolean(true); } else if ((startTimeMinutes > stopTimeMinutes) && (triggerTimeMinutes > startTimeMinutes || triggerTimeMinutes < stopTimeMinutes)) { doThat = Boolean(true); } if (doThat == false) { skip('Gogogate.closeDoor'); } }
